items.sentence: I haven\'t formed an opinion about that yet.
I haven\'t heard anything from Tom in weeks.
Tom wanted to know who Mary had been dating.
Tom wanted to sleep late, but was unable to.
You\'re forgetting one very important thing.
Tom is the kind of guy you just can\'t hate.
Tom wanted to try doing something different.
Tom asked me a bunch of questions about you.
Tom asked me how long I had lived in Boston.
You\'re a bit shorter than Tom, aren\'t you?
You\'re the only one who\'s able to do that.
I want Tom to forgive Mary for what she did.
I didn\'t think Tom had a driver\'s license.
Would you mind waiting outside for a minute?
Would you please help me carry my suitcases?
Would you show us some samples of your work?
Tom threw some money into the busker\'s hat.
Tom told Mary he hadn\'t seen John in years.
Tom knows you\'re the one that started this.
Didn\'t you just repair that three days ago?
